name: Wampire
description:
Created by: Jonathan Garcia Vazquez

Artwork by: Gabriel Garcia Vazquez

Music from https://filmmusic.io by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)

Wampire is a pixel art styled game about a cute wampire, made in just over a day!

Do not give up! it might be hard but there is a nice suprise at the end.

Tip: At some point, you can go through walls and everything is hidden
